DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 4/8/11 - no longer used by BRIDG; released for reuse by COPPA

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The code that describes the state of the overall accrual activity for a study.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:The process of enrolling, enlisting, or adding individuals to a group.:A clinical study status designating the study open to accrual.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The process of enrolling, enlisting, or adding individuals to a group.
A clinical study status designating the study open to accrual.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A clinical study status designating the study has been completed normally, according to the protocol. Subject enrollment stopped. No participants are treated or being followed up.

Concepts.definition: A clinical study status designating the study has been completed normally, according to the protocol. Subject enrollment stopped. No participants are treated or being followed up.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A request (spoken or written) to participate, be present, or take part in something:The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

Concepts.definition: A request (spoken or written) to participate, be present, or take part in something
The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A time that is yet to come.:The process of enrolling, enlisting, or adding individuals to a group.

Concepts.definition: A time that is yet to come.
The process of enrolling, enlisting, or adding individuals to a group.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The process of enrolling, enlisting, or adding individuals to a group.

Concepts.definition: The process of enrolling, enlisting, or adding individuals to a group.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A clinical study status designating that an order has been issued  to a study sponsor to delay a proposed investigation or to suspend an ongoing one. When a proposed study is placed on clinical hold, subjects may not be given the investigational product as part of the study. When an ongoing study is placed on clinical hold, no new subjects may be recruited to the study and placed on the investigational product. Subjects already in the study have to stop receiving therapy involving the investigational agent unless the FDA specifically permits it.

Concepts.definition: A clinical study status designating that an order has been issued to a study sponsor to delay a proposed investigation or to suspend an ongoing one. When a proposed study is placed on clinical hold, subjects may not be given the investigational product as part of the study. When an ongoing study is placed on clinical hold, no new subjects may be recruited to the study and placed on the investigational product. Subjects already in the study have to stop receiving therapy involving the investigational agent unless the FDA specifically permits it.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A clinical study status designating the study has been stopped prematurely and will not resume. Subject enrollment stopped. No participants are treated or being followed up.

Concepts.definition: A clinical study status designating the study has been stopped prematurely and will not resume. Subject enrollment stopped. No participants are treated or being followed up.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A clinical study status designating the study that has been stopped prematurely: Subject enrollment never started.  Study will not resume.

Concepts.definition: A clinical study status designating the study that has been stopped prematurely: Subject enrollment never started.  Study will not resume.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
